summary.span: 表示为相关端实现常用功能的基类。

span.span: Represents a base class that implements common functionality for a related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 类和 类的基类。 is the base class for the class and the class. 类实现 和 类之间共享的功能。The class implements functionality that is shared between the and classes. 此类不应在代码中直接使用。This class is not intended to be used directly in your code.

span.span: if the related end contains all the related objects from the database; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法设置标志切换为`true`。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 调用方法设置到`false`。Calling the method on an sets to `false`. 如果相关端包含在查询路径中，也可能加载 或 。An or may also be loaded if the related end is included in the query path. 有关范围的详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information about span, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). `Load`方法和相关对象加载从数据源是否是`true`。The `Load` method on and loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. 当对象处于 detached 时，标志更改从`false`到`true`。When an object is detached, the flag is changed from `false` to `true`. 若要确保在进行处理之前已完全加载相关的端，应检查是否是`false`。To guarantee that a related end is fully loaded before doing processing, you should check whether is `false`. 如果是`false`，应调用方法。If is `false`, you should call the method.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将一个或多个相关对象加载到本地集合或引用中。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads the related object or objects into the local collection or reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于被跟踪的对象，默认合并选项为 。或者，当对象没有在 中跟踪时，默认选项为 。The default merge option is for tracked objects or when the object is not tracked in the . 若要指定合并选项换不同，调用`Load`方法或采用特定参数。To specify a merge option other than , call the `Load` method on the or the that takes a specific parameter. 调用方法设置标志切换为`true`。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 方法将加载相关的对象从数据源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 都重写此方法以加载相关对象。Both and override this method to load related objects. `Load` 调用以从导航属性公开的相关端显式加载相关的对象。`Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). 调用方法设置标志切换为`true`。Calling the method sets the flag to `true`. 方法将加载相关的对象从数据源是否是`true`。The method loads related objects from the data source whether or not is `true`. 对于被跟踪的对象，默认合并选项为 。或者，当对象没有在 中跟踪时，默认选项为 。The default merge option is for tracked objects or when the object is not tracked in the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SourceRoleName As String
public: property System::String ^ SourceRoleName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取关系的源端的角色名称。

span.span: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
A that is the role name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 角色名称由指定`Role`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41). ## Examples 本主题中的示例基于[AdventureWorks 销售模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)，由生成的[实体数据模型向导](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5). 下面的示例添加了新`SalesOrderHeader`实体到`Contact`实体。The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity. 然后，它获取从所有相关的端`Contact`实体，并显示关系名称、 源角色名称和每个相关端的目标角色名称。Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#irelatedend)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#IRelatedEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#irelatedend)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源实体对象附加到缓存，则所有连接的端点添加到对象缓存和其对应关系也将添加到。If the source entity object is attached to a cache, then all the connected ends are added to the object cache and their corresponding relationships are also added to the . 还固定的关系。The of the relationship is also fixed.

summary.span: 将对象附加到相关端。

span.span: Attaches an object to the related end.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果相关的端已附加到它的某些实体，将与新的实体合并现有实体。If the related end already has some entities attached to it, the existing entities will be merged with the new entity. 新的实体不被假定相关的实体对象的完整集。The new entity is not assumed to be the complete set of related entity objects. 源实体对象和所有传入的实体对象必须为或状态。The source entity object and all entity objects passed in must be in an or state. 仅当状态管理器已经跟踪关系实例时，才允许已删除的元素。Deleted elements are allowed only when the state manager is already tracking the relationship instance.
